content: f207 orbit cowl by lisa r myers all efforts were made to make this pattern error-free for questions or support please email info@fairmountfibers com 7/19/23 © fairmount fibers ltd 2023 not to be reproduced or re-knit for profit page 1 of 3 f207 size at end of round always drop old color at back of work approximately 23½ circumference x 8 deep at beginning of round always pick up new color from underneath old color to secure it materials manos del uruguay sami 100% superwash merino approx abbreviations 273 yds / 100g 1 skip bor beginning of round manos del uruguay marla 100% superwash merino brk brioche knit knit together the next st and its yo approx 273 yds / 100g 1 skip brp brioche purl purl together the next st and its yo eor end of round shown in sami y2612 peonies a with k knit marla k600 twilight b m s marker s ndl needle us 4 / 3 5mm 16 circular needle or size to obtain gauge p purl 3 distinct stitch markers patt pattern tapestry needle pm place marker repeat repeat gauge round s round s 18 sts and 52 rnds = 4 in brioche knitting relaxed sl slip st s stitch es notes yfslyo yarn forward slip yo bring yarn to the front between one skein each of sami and marla provides enough yarn for the needles slip the next st purlwise bring yarn over ndl to two cowls back of work to form yo yo yarnover all efforts were made to make this pattern error-free for questions or support please email info@fairmountfibers com 7/19/23 © fairmount fibers ltd 2023 not to be reproduced or re-knit for profit page 2 of 3 f207 instructions work in spiral brioche rib as follows with a cast on 104 sts slide sts to other end of ndl and round 1 with a sl bor m yfslyo brk to m1 sl m1 yfslyo work the following 5 set-up row/rnds brp to m2 sl m2 yfslyo brk to eor set-up row 1 with b k1 yfslyo to end of row round 2 with b sl bor m brp yfslyo to m1 sl m1 brk set-up round 2 join being careful not to twist sts and place 2 yfslyo to m2 sl m2 brp yfslyo to eor ms the first is the bor m which never moves the second round 3 with a work as round 1 is m1 with a yfslyo brp 26 times pm this will be m2 round 4 with b sl bor m brp yfslyo to m1 remove m1 brp yfslyo brk to eor yfslyo replace m1 brk yfslyo to m2 remove m2 brk yfslyo set-up round 3 with b sl bor m and m1 brk yfslyo to m2 sl replace m2 brp yfslyo to eor m2 brp yfslyo to eor set-up round 4 with a sl bor m and m1 yfslyo brp to m2 repeat rnds 1-4 until m2 is next to bor m then repeat
